scripts.init:prod: npm install -g pm2 && pm2 update && npm install -g pm2-windows-startup
scripts.build:cp:common: cpx "src/**/!(*.ts|*.md|nodemon.json)" dist && cpx package.json dist && cpx package-lock.json dist && cpx src/deployment/pm2.json dist && cpx src/environment/.env.prod dist/.env
scripts.clean-dist: rimraf dist/app dist/deployment dist/dist dist/environment dist/scripts dist/ssl-localhost dist/tools rimraf dist/*.js dist/*.map dist/*.json
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean-dist && tsc && npm run build:cp:common && cd dist && npm install --production && npm prune --production
scripts.start:prod: pm2 restart deployment/ecosystem.config.js --env production && pm2 save || echo === The production environment is not initialized. run `npm run init:prod` first, then retry. ===
